DAO.discourse

Class SemanticRelatedness

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.discourse.SemanticCohesion
      • DAO.discourse.SemanticRelatedness
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SemanticRelatedness
extends DAO.discourse.SemanticCohesion
    Computes a semantic relatedness value of two analysis element by combining three different semantic relatedness metric techniques: Latent Semantic Analysis, Latent Dirichlet Allocation and three different WordNet metrics: Leacock Chodorow, Wu Palmer and PathSim.
    Author:
    Gabriel Gutu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static double getSimilarityMeasure(double WNSim,
                                          double lsaSim,
                                          double ldaSim)
        Combines similarity metrics with different weights in order to compute a final semantic relatedness score.
        Parameters:
        WNSim - computed WordNet similarity
        lsaSim - computed LatentSemanticAnalysis similarity
        ldaSim - computed Latent Dirichlet similarity
        Returns:
        computed semantic relatedness score
